name: Knight
description: A knight formed of folded cards offers a sword also made from cards. The Knight card signifies trust and loyalty.

person.upright: A trustworthy person who honors their commitments.
person.reverse: A person who can't be trusted, or a traitor posing as a loyal friend.

creatureTrap.upright: A creature bound by oaths or who serves someone else.
creatureTrap.reverse: A knight who has failed to live up to their code of honor (such as a death knight).

place.upright: A place of sanctuary, where strong traditions protect those who take shelter inside.
place.reverse: A place where a great betrayal took place, or a location with treacherous terrain or traps.

treasure.upright: A treasure celebrating or commemorating an oath (such as a wedding ring), or magic weapons or armor associated with knights or paladins.
treasure.reverse: A treasure that carries a hidden curse, or a magic item that fails when it's needed most.

situation.upright: A situation that requires loyalty in one's companions and faithfulness to them.
situation.reverse: A situation involving the betrayal of trust, or rampant suspicion.
